snippet: Mr. Pearl was a lawyer and investor in Washington who entered the book business on a quest to publish the serious, quality literature that he felt large corporate publishing houses had neglected.
abstract: Frank H Pearl, book publisher with a zeal for serious literature, dies at age 68.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pearl was a lawyer and investor in Washington who entered the book business on a quest to publish the serious, quality literature that he felt large corporate publishing houses had neglected.

headline.main: Frank H. Pearl, Publisher With a Zeal for the Serious, Dies at 68
headline.print_headline: Frank H. Pearl, 68, Publisher With a Zeal for the Serious
